result.title: Advice regarding Bad Habit of Seeing the solution too early
result.content: Hello Codeforces members.. I am a newbie in competitive programming but I have developed bad habit of seeing the solutions in 1-2 days... I really try hard during those 1-2 days devoting 7-8 hours on the day... What should I do.....????????????????? Another habit is to copy-paste the difficult code . Can anyone please help me regarding the same .It will be a great help. Regards.
